name: The Road To Heaven
description:
This game was made on a mini jam on the theme of heaven.

You play as a robot who must go to heaven, but God was confused due to the fact that robots did not go to heaven before, so God sent the robot to pass tests to understand how his likeness of the soul is pure and brave in front of dangers

the game is essentially made in two days from zero point.

The game has only 5 levels, and not very many game mechanics. Among them: flight, double jump, wind rune that pushes you up, and Quicksilver rune that speeds you up for a short time.

Controls:

WSAD - walk
SPACE - jump / duble jump
SHIFT - fly
